original_text: So it is not really I myself who am doing those wrong things. Instead, sin has power in my life. It is sin that causes me to do wrong things.
korean_text: 이제는 그것을 행하는 자가 내가 아니요 내 속에 거하는 죄니라

sentences.original_text: So it is not really I myself
who am doing those wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 잘못된 일들을 하는 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, sin has power in my life
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 죄가 내 삶에 권세를 가집니다

sentences.original_text: It is sin that causes me to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 바로 죄가 나를 잘못된 일들로 이끄는 것입니다
